definition: A condition or state characterized by a deficiency or shortage of something, often used to describe a lack or scarcity of a particular resource, substance, or quality. It is commonly used to refer to a deficiency or insufficiency in various aspects of life, such as a shortage of food, a lack of essential nutrients, or a dearth of necessary supplies. It can also be used to describe a deficiency in quality, skill, or ability.
